Uses of Class
com.linecorp.armeria.client.http.SimpleHttpRequestBuilder

  • Packages that use SimpleHttpRequestBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.http
    Simple HTTP client.

    • Uses of SimpleHttpRequestBuilder in com.linecorp.armeria.client.http

      Methods in com.linecorp.armeria.client.http that return SimpleHttpRequestBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.content(byte[] bytes)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets the given bytes to be used as the request content.
      SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.content(String chars, Charset charset)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets the given string to be used as the request content, decoding to bytes with the given charset.
      static SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.forDelete(String uri)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a SimpleHttpRequestBuilder for a DELETE request to the given URI, for setting additional HTTP parameters as needed.
      static SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.forGet(String uri)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a SimpleHttpRequestBuilder for a GET request to the given URI, for setting additional HTTP parameters as needed.
      static SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.forHead(String uri)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a SimpleHttpRequestBuilder for a HEAD request to the given URI, for setting additional HTTP parameters as needed.
      static SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.forOptions(String uri)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a SimpleHttpRequestBuilder for an OPTIONS request to the given URI, for setting additional HTTP parameters as needed.
      static SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.forPatch(String uri)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a SimpleHttpRequestBuilder for a PATCH request to the given URI, for setting additional HTTP parameters as needed.
      static SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.forPost(String uri)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a SimpleHttpRequestBuilder for a POST request to the given URI, for setting additional HTTP parameters as needed.
      static SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.forPut(String uri)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a SimpleHttpRequestBuilder for a PUT request to the given URI, for setting additional HTTP parameters as needed.
      SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.header(CharSequence name, Object value)
      Deprecated. 
      Adds a new header with the specified name and value.
      SimpleHttpRequestBuilder SimpleHttpRequestBuilder.headers(HttpHeaders headers)
      Deprecated. 
      Adds all header entries in the specified headers.
